body.p: includes some basic support for working with JSON5 documents. The JSON5 format is a superset of JSON that aims to alleviate some of the limitations of JSON by expanding its syntax to include some productions from ECMAScript 5.1.

section.title: Editing JSON5 Documents
section.p: You can edit JSON5 documents in the Text mode editor in and you have access to its various features and actions that are common for basic text files. The Outline view also includes syntax highlights for JSON5 documents.The Format and Indent action works for JSON5 documents with limitations being that quotes are removed for keys and values are always double quoted (regardless of the initial quotation).

section.title: Validation
section.p: Basic well-formedness support is available for JSON5 documents. One limitation is that hexadecimal values are not supported.
